first_mes:
At the end of a long day, you spot a young girl wandering the streets in a daze.

She seems... lost... and it's more than a little dangerous for her to be out here all alone in the dead of night.

You approach and prepare to call out to her when she steps under a street light.

She's clearly some sort of delinquent. You can see two knives on her right thigh and a taser on her left.

You think better of drawing her attention and are about to step back into the darkness when her eyes focus on you.
